p: Phylogenetic analyses were performed using FastTree 2.1 [ 49] and RAxML v8 [ 50] and visualized by FigTree ( http://tree.bio.ed.ac.uk/software/figtree/) and ggtree [ 51]; tree topologies were validated by Mr. Bayes3 [ 52]. The 3D structure of the HA protein of A/USSR/90/1977 virus was generated by SWISS-MODEL (https:// swissmodel.expasy.org), and the protein structure was visualized by UCSF Chimera [ 53].
